channel.title: simplicity on Alexander Saavedra
channel.description: Recent content in simplicity on Alexander Saavedra

item.title: Digital Minimalism
item.description: Background Something is wrong with us now days. Why is it so hard to deal with a bit of boredom or lack of stimulation from our smartphones? The answer goes deeper than many thought. After going through Cal Newport’s books: Deep Work and So Good They Can’t Ignore You I had to pick up his most recent work on the subject of software technology in our lives. This book isn’t just about getting work done, it is about getting your life back from companies who want your attention.
